name: tiangong-restaurant-lottery
description: 餐厅积分抽奖系统 - 微信小程序前端v2.0

scripts.lint:shadow: eslint pages/**/*.js utils/**/*.js components/**/*.js app.js --rule "no-shadow: error" --format stylish
scripts.lint:shadow:report: eslint pages/**/*.js utils/**/*.js components/**/*.js app.js --rule "no-shadow: error" --format table
scripts.lint:unused: eslint pages/**/*.js utils/**/*.js components/**/*.js app.js --rule "no-unused-vars: error" --format stylish
scripts.lint:unused:report: eslint pages/**/*.js utils/**/*.js components/**/*.js app.js --rule "no-unused-vars: error" --format table
scripts.lint:unused:json: eslint pages/**/*.js utils/**/*.js components/**/*.js app.js --rule "no-unused-vars: error" --format json --output-file .cursor/unused-vars-report.json
scripts.lint:jsdoc: eslint pages/**/*.js utils/**/*.js components/**/*.js app.js --format stylish
scripts.lint:jsdoc:report: eslint pages/**/*.js utils/**/*.js components/**/*.js app.js --format table --output-file docs/jsdoc-lint-report.txt
scripts.lint:comments: eslint pages/**/*.js utils/**/*.js components/**/*.js app.js --rule "require-jsdoc: error" --rule "valid-jsdoc: error" --format stylish
scripts.lint:quality: eslint pages/**/*.js utils/**/*.js components/**/*.js app.js --format stylish
scripts.lint:quality:report: eslint pages/**/*.js utils/**/*.js components/**/*.js app.js --format html --output-file .cursor/quality-report.html
scripts.quality: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run test:coverage
scripts.quality:fast: npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.quality:fix: npm run lint:fix && npm run format
scripts.dev: echo '请使用微信开发者工具运行项目'
scripts.build: echo '请使用微信开发者工具构建项目'

author: Restaurant Lottery Team
